content: in 1st single_crochet fasten_off 315 single_crochet & 315 chain 2 color 1 round 60 join in half_double_crochet to the right of any single_crochet chain color 2 2 decrease counts as 1st dc3tog *double_crochet in 64 sts treble_crochet-v = treble_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet in same space dc3tog* 9 times double_crochet in 64 sts join with slip_stitch in treble_crochet-w = treble_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet in same space top of 1st dc3tog fasten_off 640 double_crochet & 10 dc3tog round 67 join in any chain 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same chain 2 chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 7 times skip next chain 2 color 2 * treble_crochet-v treble_crochet-w treble_crochet-v in next chain 2 skip next chain 2 single_crochet round 61 join in double_crochet to the right of any dc3tog in next chain 2 + chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 11 chain 3 tr2tog counts as 1st tr3tog *treble_crochet in next times skip next chain 2* 20 times repeat from * st edc in next st double_crochet in next st ehdc in next st to + chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 3 times chain 2 join half_double_crochet in 54 sts ehdc in next st double_crochet in next st with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet edc in next st treble_crochet in next st + tr3tog* 9 times 21 treble_crochet-w 42 treble_crochet-v 231 chain 2 & 252 single_crochet repeat from * to + join with slip_stitch in top of 1st tr3tog fasten_off page 9 of 11 this pattern is only available for download from ravelry com ©frank orandle tides of change round 68 slip_stitch into next chain 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same round 72 note you will be making the tr3tog chain 2 chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 5 times skip next chain using the last chain 1 the tr4tog and first chain 1 2 * treble_crochet-w in next chain 1 4 times skip next chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 + chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 8 times round 72 slip_stitch into 2nd chain 1 chain 5 treble_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet skip next chain 2* 20 times repeat from * to + in same chain 1 counts as 1st treble_crochet-w * treble_crochet-v in chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 2 times chain 2 join with next chain 1 2 times treble_crochet-w in next chain 1 3 times slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off tr3tog using last chain 1 the tr4tog and the first 84 treble_crochet-w 168 chain 2 & 189 single_crochet chain 1 + treble_crochet-w in next chain 1* 20 times repeat from * to + join with slip_stitch in 4th chain of starting color 3 chain 5 fasten_off round 69 join in chain 2 to the right of last join 84 treble_crochet-w 126 treble_crochet-v & 21 tr3tog chain 1 single_crochet in same chain 2 chain 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 4 times skip next chain 2 *treble_crochet-w in next chain 1 treble_crochet-v in color 5 next chain 1 6
